newsitem.title: USA: RESEARCH ALERT - Boise Cascade upgraded.
newsitem.headline: RESEARCH ALERT - Boise Cascade upgraded.

text.p: - Jensen Securities upgraded Boise Cascade Corp to neutral from underperform after the company announced plans to sell its coated paper business to Mead Corp for $650 million, analyst Steven Dietrich said.
- Some of the sale proceeds will be used to pay down Boise Cascade debt, which could boost the company's net income by $0.25 to $0.30 a share annually, Dietrich estimated.
- Dietrich also said he thought the worst was over for Boise's partly owned subsidiary Boise Cascade Office Products Corp, which has fallen to 17-1/2 from 49-1/2 in May.
- Pending completion of the sale, Jensen left unchanged its estimates that Boise Cascade will lose $0.50 a share this year and earn a profit of $0.50 a share next year.
